name: video_comment_replies
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_v3.
Tool description: TikTok API
API description: Fetches the replies to a specific comment on a TikTok video using the provided API key.

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment for which to retrieve replies.

video_id.description: The ID of the video containing the comment.

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch additional replies. Defaults to None.
